mapper.insert: INSERT INTO curriculum_vitae( account_id, company, department, position, hire_date, leave_date, cancel, input_user, input_time, update_user, update_time, remarks ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{company}, #{department}, #{position}, #{hireDate}, #{leaveDate}, #{cancel}, #{inputUser}, #{inputTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks} )
mapper.select: SELECT id,account_id AS accountId, company, department, position, hire_date AS hireDate, leave_date AS leaveDate, cancel, input_user AS inputUser, input_time AS inputTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime, remarks FROM curriculum_vitae WHERE id=#{id}
